front.title: Multi-party Multi-Domain Trust Architecture Recommendations for SDN Deployment in Carrier Network

abstract.t: This draft analyzes implementation methodologies for addressing the security requirements of SDN adopted network architecture through Public Key Infrastructure. The draft analyzes the relevant design patterns of PKI based Trust Models to address the challenges faced during SDN Adoption. And, the draft defines the considerations for setting up a Trust Relationship Management framework suitable for PKI based SDN integrated environment.
